tit.cmt: Karuno oiratsume→Karu no Oiratsumeとしました。

sen.j: 軽大娘皇女（かるのおおいらつめ）は第19代天皇であった允恭天皇の皇女であった。
sen.e: Karuno oiratsume was a princess, who was a daughter of the 19th imperial ruler, Emperor Ingyo.
Karu no oiratsume was a princess, who was a daughter of the 19th imperial ruler, Emperor Ingyo.
Karu no oiratsume was a princess, who was a daughter of the 19th imperial ruler, Emperor Ingyo.

sen.j: 母は皇后の忍坂大中姫（おしさかのおおなかつのひめのみこと）。
sen.e: Her mother was Empress Oshisakano onakatsunohimeno mikoto.
Her mother was Empress Oshisaka no onakatsunohime no mikoto.
sen.cmt: Oshisaka no onakatsunohime no mikotoとしました。
sen.e: Her mother was Empress Oshisaka no onakatsunohime no mikoto.

sen.j: 古事記によれば大変に美しい女性であったため、その美しさが衣を通してあらわれるようだ、という意味を込めて衣通姫（そとおりひめ）と呼ばれた。
sen.e: According to "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters), she was so beautiful a woman that she was called Sotoorihime, by which it was meant that her beauty appeared as if it could penetrate her clothes.

According to the Kojiki (The Records of Ancient Matters), she was such a beautiful woman that she was called Sotoorihime, by which it was meant that her beauty appeared as if it could penetrate her clothes.
sen.cmt: 原文表記に合わせ、"Kojiki"のクォーテーション消去、the追加、so beautiful a woman→such a beautiful womanとしました。
sen.e: According to the Kojiki (The Records of Ancient Matters), she was such a beautiful woman that she was called Sotoorihime, by which it was meant that her beauty appeared as if it could penetrate her clothes.

sen.j: 同母兄であった木梨軽皇子（きなしのかるのみこ）と情を通じた。
sen.e: She had an (incestuous) affair with her elder brother-uterine Kinashi no karunomiko.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: She had an (incestuous) affair with her older brother-uterine Kinashi no karu no miko.
sen.cmt: elder→older、Kinashi no karu no mikoとしました。
sen.e: She had an (incestuous) affair with her older brother-uterine Kinashi no karu no miko.

sen.j: それが原因となって允恭天皇が崩御した後に木梨軽皇子は失脚、伊予へ流刑となる。
sen.e: As a result, Kinashi no karunomiko was overthrown after the demise of Emperor Ingyo, and was deported to Iyo Province.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: As a result, Kinashi no karu no miko was overthrown after the demise of Emperor Ingyo, and was deported to Iyo Province.
sen.cmt: 余分なスペース消去、Kinashi no karu no mikoとしました。
sen.e: As a result, Kinashi no karu no miko was overthrown after the demise of Emperor Ingyo, and was deported to Iyo Province.

sen.j: 軽大娘皇女はその後を追い、伊予の国で二人は自害して果てる。
sen.e: Later, she followed him and the two committed joint suicide in Iyo Province.
Later, she followed him and the two committed joint suicide in Iyo Province.
Later, she followed him and the two committed joint suicide in Iyo Province.

sen.j: 日本書紀においては二人の仲が発覚した直後の允恭24年に軽大娘皇女本人が伊予へ流されている。
sen.e: According to "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan), Karuno oiratsume herself was deported to Iyo Province in A.D. 435 immediately after their relationship was brought to light.
According to the Nihonshoki (Chronicles of Japan), Karu no oiratsume herself was deported to Iyo Province in A.D. 435 immediately after their relationship was brought to light.
sen.cmt: 原文に合わせ"Nihonshoki"のクォーテーション消去、the追加、スペース消去、Karu no oiratsumeとしました。
sen.e: According to the Nihonshoki (Chronicles of Japan), Karu no oiratsume herself was deported to Iyo Province in A.D. 435 immediately after their relationship was brought to light.
